testcase.name: Create a New User
testcase.system-out: Given user on the homepage..................................................passed And user clicks on Sign in button...........................................passed When user fills registration email textbox with "email_address".............passed And user clicks create an account button....................................passed And user enters the following details.......................................passed And user clicks register button.............................................passed Then validate user firstname and lastname is displayed in dashboard.........passed And user click on signout...................................................passed

testcase.name: Login with user credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user on the homepage..................................................passed And user clicks on Sign in button...........................................passed When user enter "firstname766@gmail.com" and "Inquiry@1234".................passed And user click on Signin button.............................................passed And user move cursor over Womens link and click on sub menu T-shirts........passed And Get Name/Text of the first product displayed on the page................passed And click on Add product to the cart........................................passed And Proceed to the checkout page and continue till payments.................passed Then Validate on the payments page if the product details are correct.......passed
